title: Added comments and error checks to torch.utils.trainer and torch.utils.trainer.plugins
body_html:
The trainer module in torch.utils.trainer lacks comments and error checking. This pull request adds basic comments and some argument validation to reduce the learning curve with this module.

It also adds a PluginFactory Plugin which allows users to call their custom functions from trainer. It's a convenience function that can be used in lieu of subclassing Plugin (currently the only supported paradigm).
body_text:
The trainer module in torch.utils.trainer lacks comments and error checking. This pull request adds basic comments and some argument validation to reduce the learning curve with this module.
It also adds a PluginFactory Plugin which allows users to call their custom functions from trainer. It's a convenience function that can be used in lieu of subclassing Plugin (currently the only supported paradigm).
body:
The `trainer` module in torch.utils.trainer lacks comments and error checking. This pull request adds basic comments and some argument validation to reduce the learning curve with this module. 

It also adds a `PluginFactory` Plugin which allows users to call their custom functions from `trainer`. It's a convenience function that can be used in lieu of subclassing `Plugin` (currently the only supported paradigm).
